MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL57 postcode area of Bethesda. This is causing flickering power and reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:25AM. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45AM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:40AM on 12th February 2021
